sk1.name: Sprout
sk1.desc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

sk2.name: Teleportation
sk2.desc: Teleports to any point on the map.

sk3.name: Nature's Call
sk3.desc: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.

sk4.name: Wrath of Nature
sk4.desc:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
